personal_info.name: Abu Rana
personal_info.headline: Deputy  Director  (Commercial  AC,R&I) at Walton Hi Tech Industries PLC

about:
Highly skilled R&D Engineer with over 7 years of experience in designing and improving residential (over 5 years) and commercial (over 2 years) air conditioners. I excel at taking projects from start (R&I) to finish (Model launch), using my expertise in thermodynamics, heat transfer, fluid dynamics as well as production engineering knowledge. I am proficient in advanced engineering drawing software like SOLIDWORKS and AutoCAD, as well as hands-on prototyping, to create more efficient and reliable HVAC products. I am eager to use my skills to innovate and help develop the next generation of air conditioning technology.
Technical Expertise:
•	Deep understanding of thermodynamics, fluid dynamics, and heat transfer principles.
•	Proficiency in HVAC system design, including vapor compression cycles, refrigeration, VRF, and air-handling units (AHUs).
•	Experience with a variety of HVAC components such as compressors, heat exchangers, fans, and other cooling components.
•	Knowledge of different air conditioning technologies, including Split type, LCAC, VRF (Variable Refrigerant Flow), chillers.
•	Familiarity with manufacturing processes and designing for manufacturability (DFM).
Research & Development:
•	Proven ability to conduct product research, technical feasibility studies, and performance analysis.
•	Experience in prototyping, building, and testing new products and concepts.
•	Strong skills in data acquisition and analysis to validate designs and improve performance.
•	Experience in a lab (enthalpy) environment for product testing and experimentation, including psychrometric and balanced ambient labs.
Software and Tools:
•	Proficiency in CAD software (SolidWorks, AutoCAD) for mechanical design and 3D modeling.
•	Experience with simulation software such as CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics) and FEA (Finite Element Analysis) for design optimization. (Low experience due to facility)
Project and Product Management:
•	Ability to manage R&D projects from concept to commercialization.
•	Experience in a product lifecycle management (PLM) environment.
•	Strong project planning, time management, and organizational skills.
•	Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including supply chain, manufacturing, sales, marketing, and quality assurance.
Standards:
•	ISO 15042
•	ISO 5151
•	Working with BSTI
Problem-Solving and Innovation:
•	Experience with root-cause analysis and design for reliability.
•	A track record of driving value engineering and cost-reduction initiatives.
